name: srtti_mirror
description: Mirror of (ajson)[https://github.com/sbcgua/ajson] mirror to z2ui5_ namespace

scripts.clone: git clone --branch 7.40 https://github.com/sandraros/S-RTTI.git input && npm install @abaplint/cli -g && abaplint --fix
scripts.rename: abaplint abaplint_rename.json --rename && rm src/* && cp output/input/src/* src/
